overview: Chilean director Nicolás Pérez’s documentary draws its narrative from a house, two inhabitants. One nation, two perspectives. Stemming from these points, Ale and Shanti, two Bolivian students living in Brazil, experience being away from home while, at the same time, shaping a new concept of home. Together, they unearth memories which will allow us to learn about their roots
title: O Hábito De Habitar
